Gehe zu tv shows ReplaceWindow(videos,videodb://tvshows/) !string.contains(container.folderpath,tvshows) !Skin.HasSetting(menu_hide_navigationtvshows)

Gehe zu $LOCALIZE[2] ReplaceWindow(music,musiclibrary://music/) !Window.Is(music) !Skin.HasSetting(menu_hide_navigationmusic)
